name: tea party kit
description:
{click on any image to enlarge}

the tea party includes:

* one hat
* one boa
* one tea cup and saucer
* one teaspoon
* one goodie bag

Little ladies love celebrating their special day with this dainty tea party in the colors of black,white and red.

Details:

-white woven tea hat trimmed with black organza ribbon and finished with a black, white and red posy pin

-black marabou feather boa

-mini white porcelain tea cup 2" height (3 oz) with matching white porcelain saucer, 4.5" diameter

-delicate silver plated teaspoon with teapot detail,  4 7/8" long

-red organza bag with lace and feather fringe 5" x 6.5" (not filled)

Want to view cupcake toppers, paper goods, invitations and more for the tea party?  Click "tea party" to the right. --->

name: cooking party kit
description:
{click on any image to enlarge}

the cooking party includes:

* one apron
* one chef's cap
* one Chinese take out container
* one mini rolling pin

Cooking is full of fun and learning.  What better way for a kid to celebrate their day than to hang out with friends, get their hands messy and make something delicious to eat together?

Details:

* one chef's apron, child size, white with red and white gingham trim, heavy duty  18.5" x 22" for ages 3-8

* one chef's cap to match apron, high quality, white with red and white gingham trim, adjustable closure  

* one clear Chinese take out container with wire handle 4" x 3-1/8" x 4"  (not filled)

* one mini wooden rolling pin with red handles 7" long, length of red and white gingham ribbon included for tying

Want to see a yummy banner and more for the cooking party?  Click "cooking party" to the right.  --->

name: ballet party kit
description:
{click on any image to enlarge}

the ballet party kit includes:

* one tutu
* one hair clip
* one wand

Dancing and spinning in pink or lavender with daisy accents is just twirly girly fun.

Details:

* one pink or lavender tutu with ribbon bow and white daisies around the waist, 12" long, waist stretches to 28", for ages 2 to 8

* one pink or lavender curly ribbon hair clip with daisy flower accent, alligator clip, 4"

* one ribbon wand with daisy detail, white plastic 12" stick with pink or lavender curling ribbon

Want to view decorations, paper goods and more great stuff for the ballet party?  Click on "ballet party" to the right. --->

name: superhero party kit
description:
{click on any image to enlarge}

The superhero party kit includes:

*one cape
*one mask
*one goody bag
*one certificate

Kids will summon their fearlessness and unite to conquer evil with this fabulous superhero party kit.

Details:

* black superhero cape, red or pink lining and felt circle, child's initial inside circle, velcro closure around neck, 23" long

* black superhero mask made with a double layer of felt, covered elastic strap

* black superhero bag with lightning bolt detail, faux suede, 4" x 5-1/2" (not filled)

* official superhero certificate, white cardstock with gold seal and yellow lightning bolt, blank for child's name, perfect to present to a gutsy kid after they have completed superhero training

Want to view a superhero banner and other items for the superhero party?  Click on "superhero party" to the right --->

name: cowboy/girl party kit
description:
{click on any image to enlarge}

the cowboy/girl party includes:

* one vest
* one bandana
* one cowboy hat
* one goodie bag

This cowboy and cowgirl gear will make your next shindig an ace-high western roundup.

Details:

*one felt vest, brown with white zigzag stitching, a pocket and red or pink star detail, available in small (ages 3-4), medium (ages 5-6) or large (ages 7-8)

* one bandana, pink or red, triangular, pre-knotted with velcro closure beside the knot for safety and ease of putting on and taking off

*one straw western hat, child-size, thin black rope band, 24" circumference

*one burlap treat bag with matching red or pink star detail, 6" x 6" x 5" with round bottom {not filled}

Want to see a burlap flag banner and more items for the cowboy and cowgirl party?  Click "cowboy/cowgirl party" to the right. --->
